name: Bomo's Birthday Battle!
description:
It's Bomo's Birthday! Bomo decided to go out for a nice stroll on the town but he forgot his name tag at home! Help him defeat the cat catchers trying to take him to the pound! Throw hair balls at them to try to defeat them. It is Bomo's birthday after all, so make sure Bomo gets back in time to celebrate!
